price: (53) Or have they a share of dominion? Then [if that were so], they would not give the people [even as much as] the speck on a date seed.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ فَإِذٗا لَّا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: am lahum naṣībun mina al-mul'ki fa-idhan lā yu'tūna al-nāsa naqīran
translations: (even as much as the) speck on a date seed
